record.dc:title: Planted in the early spring
record.dc:description: Planted in the early Spring; tended thro' long Summer days; cut, dried, sorted, and seeded; - all this before assembling. Handles of chestnut and white oak; bark of poplar, basswood or rhododendron; wropt and tied; spread and sewed, cut to proper length, and combed free of seeds. A broom is nigh a year in th' making.
record.dc:subject: Handicraft
Crops
Broom making
Gatlinburg, Tennessee
Pi Beta Phi Settlement School
Changing Mission of Pi Beta Phi Fraternity for Women in Gatlinburg, Tennessee, 1944-1964
